briefdescription.para: Write errors in the message log and silently fail.

detaileddescription.para: Write errors in the message log and re-throw exceptions

briefdescription.para: The ExceptionBehavior enum define how exceptions generated by OpenCL should be treated.
The Type enum represent OpenCL device type.
The Info enum maps to OpenCL info constants.
OpenCL string for message logs.
Returns the active device.

detaileddescription.para: The active device is set as the default device for all OpenCL operations, once it is set it cannot be changed until QGIS is restarted (this is due to the way the underlying OpenCL library is built).

briefdescription.para: Returns infoType information about the active (default) device.
Returns the active platform OpenCL version string (e.g.

detaileddescription.para:
1.1, 2.0 etc.) or a blank string if there is no active platform.
QGIS 3.6

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a suitable OpenCL platform and device is available on this system and initialize the QGIS OpenCL system by activating the preferred device if specified in the user the settings, if no preferred device was set or the preferred device could not be found the first GPU device is activated, the first CPU device acts as a fallback if none of the previous could be found.

detaileddescription.para: This function must always be called before using QGIS OpenCL utils

briefdescription.para: Extract and return the build log error from error.
Build the program from source in the given context and depending on exceptionBehavior can throw or catch the exceptions.
Build the program from source, depending on exceptionBehavior can throw or catch the exceptions.
Create an OpenCL command queue from the default context.

detaileddescription.para: This wrapper is required in order to prevent a crash when running on OpenCL platforms < 2

briefdescription.para: Context factory.

simplesect.para: a new context for the default device or an invalid context if no device were identified or OpenCL support is not available and enabled

briefdescription.para: Returns a formatted description for the device.
Returns a formatted description for the device identified by deviceId.
Create a string identifier from a device.
Returns infoType information about the device.
Returns a list of OpenCL devices found on this sysytem.
Returns true if OpenCL is enabled in the user settings.
Returns a string representation from an OpenCL errorCode.
Read from the settings the preferred device identifier.
Set the OpenCL user setting to enabled.
Set the base path to OpenCL program directory.
Returns the full path to a an OpenCL source file from the baseName ('.cl' extension is automatically appended)
Read an OpenCL source file from path.
Returns the base path to OpenCL program directory.
Store in the settings the preferred deviceId device identifier.

Activate a device identified by its preferredDeviceId by making it the default device if the device does not exists or deviceId is empty, the first GPU device will be activated, if a GPU device is not found, the first CPU device will be chosen instead.

detaileddescription.para: Called once by init() when OpenCL is used for the first time in a QGIS working session.

simplesect.para: true if the device could be found and activated. Return false if the device was already the active one or if a device could not be activated.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the OpenCL system by setting and activating the default device.
The QgsOpenClUtils class is responsible for common OpenCL operations such as.

listitem.para: store and retrieve preferences for the default device
check opencl device availability and automatically choose the first GPU device
loading program sources from standard locations
